root: ^Casper: 'Yikes. That worked as well as lighting a candle in a rainstorm. I wonder how Dylan's feeling right now.'
^Dylan: "They really are just like mom and dad, splitting up into separate rooms after every fight."
^Dylan: "I'm not gonna stop trying though! Let's chase after them!!"
^Dylan: "Mom typically needs a little longer to cool down than dad, usually in the attic. I think I saw dad heading to my room."
